General.Name: Hunan Huakai Cultural and Creative Co Ltd
General.Description: Huakai Yibai Technology Co.,Ltd. provides environmental art design services for indoor spaces in the People's Republic of China. The company offers services for museums, theme pavilion, and exhibition halls; and home gardening, automobile and motorcycle accessories, industrial and commercial supplies, health and beauty, 3c electronic products, outdoor sports, etc., as well engages in boutique business. It provides its products through online stores on third-party platforms. The company was formerly known as Hunan Huakai Cultural and Creative Co., Ltd. Huakai Yibai Technology Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Lugu International Industrial Park, Changsha, China
